item.title: Emission Volumetrics and volume shaders
item.description: These are two closely related shaders that go well with each other. Lets start with the emission. It makes an object glow with a particular colour. This is useful when the lighting used in a scene is shaped a particular way(like those halo lights streamers use). This gives the scene the specific look imagined. If youâ€™ve seen a rendered image and something made it look ethereal or punchy, its probably the emission shader.
